flow.name: getMoviesByCity
flow.doc:description: Returns list of movies by City

db:select.doc:name: Select all movies available in city
db:select.db:sql: select movie_name, lang, genre from movie_details where movie_name in (select distinct movie from loc_details where city = :city)

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map(value, index)-> { movie_name: value.movie_name default "", language: value.lang default "", genre: value.genre default "" }

db:select.doc:name: Select movie details available in the city

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json import * from dw::core::Strings --- payload map(value,index) -> { movie_name: value.movie_name default "", description: value.movie_Desc default "", genre: value.genre default "", language: value.lang default "", duration: value.duration default "", cast: value.cast default "", crew: value.crew default "", releaseDate: value.release_date default "" }

db:select.doc:name: Select location details
db:select.db:sql: select movie, loc, address, timeslots, price from loc_details where movie = :movie and city = :city

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map(value,index) -> { location_name: value.loc default "", address: value.address default "", slots: splitBy(value.timeslots,';') default [], Prices: value.price as String default "" }

set-variable.value: #[{ customerName : upper(payload.customerName), movieName : upper(payload.movieName), location : upper(payload.location), city : upper(payload.city), seats: payload.seats, timeSlot : payload.timeSlot, couponCode : upper(payload.couponCode) }]

db:select.doc:name: Select price of ticket
db:select.db:sql: select price from loc_details where movie = :movie and city = :city and loc =:loc

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/xml ns ns0 http://www.example.org/BookTicketService/ --- { ns0#BookTicket: { customerName: vars.inc_data.customerName, movieName: vars.inc_data.movieName, location: vars.inc_data.location, city: vars.inc_data.city, seats: vars.inc_data.seats, timeslot: vars.inc_data.timeSlot, couponCode: vars.inc_data.couponCode, price: payload.price } }

%dw 2.0 output application/json import * from dw::core::Strings --- { ETicket: { orderId: payload.body.BookTicketResponse.orderId default "", customerName: payload.body.BookTicketResponse.customerName default "", movieName: payload.body.BookTicketResponse.movieName default "", location: payload.body.BookTicketResponse.location default "", city: payload.body.BookTicketResponse.city default "", seatsBooked: payload.body.BookTicketResponse.seatsBooked default "", seatsBooked: substringBefore(payload.body.BookTicketResponse.seatsBooked, ';') default "", slot: substringAfter(payload.body.BookTicketResponse.seatsBooked, ';') default "", PriceDetails: { "Total-Price": "Rs " ++ payload.body.BookTicketResponse.TotalPrice as String default "", Discount: "Rs " ++ payload.body.BookTicketResponse.Discount as String default "", "Amount-Paid": "Rs " ++ payload.body.BookTicketResponse.AmountPaid as String default "" } } }
